attributes.action: change the law to make it necessary for the incumbent party to call a General Election, within 6 months, in the event of the leader of that party being replaced.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At a General Election, whether politicians like it or not, the public is mainly voting for a particular party leader to become the next PM. When that party leader is replaced, the new leader is not the person the public voted for and therefore they should have the opportunity to vote again. In the event of a constituency MP standing down or expiring mid-term, the public is given a vote. The same should be true for the most powerful political office in the land.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
